hero.title: Stable platforms for every build.
hero.subtitle: Boards engineered for consistent performance and clean cable runs.

overview.title: Built to power daily systems.
overview.body: Atlas motherboards focus on stable chipsets, clean power delivery, and dependable connectivity.

cards.title: Stable power
cards.body: Reliable power delivery with consistent performance under load.

cards.title: Storage ready
cards.body: M.2 and SATA options for fast boot drives and bulk storage.

cards.title: Connectivity
cards.body: USB, HDMI, and LAN tuned for dependable daily use.

products.title: ATLAS RAVEN H311 V1 Motherboard with DDR4, M.2 for Intel 6th-9th Gen
products.subtitle: H311 chipset, Micro-ATX, DDR4
features: Wide CPU Support - Compatible with Intel 6th to 9th Gen processors
Fast Memory Performance - Dual-channel DDR4 up to 32GB, speeds reaching 2666MHz

products.title: ATLAS RAVEN B450M Frost - Micro-ATX AM4 Motherboard with Ryzen 1000-5600 Support
products.subtitle: B450 chipset, Micro-ATX, AM4
features: Wide CPU Support - Compatible with AMD Ryzen 1st-5th Gen processors on the AM4 socket
High-Speed Memory - Dual DDR4 slots supporting up to 32 GB and 3200 MHz (OC)

products.title: ATLAS RAVEN H61 V3 Motherboard with DDR3, HDMI & M.2 NVMe Slot
products.subtitle: H61 chipset, DDR3
features: Wide CPU Support - Compatible with Intel 2nd & 3rd Gen Core i7/i5/i3, Pentium, and Celeron processors (up to 95W TDP)
Efficient Memory Performance - Supports up to 16 GB DDR3 RAM with speeds up to 1600 MHz

products.title: ATLAS RAVEN H81 V3- Reliable ATX Motherboard for 4th Gen Intel CPUs
products.subtitle: H81 chipset
features: 4th Gen Intel CPU Support - Compatible with Intel Core i7/i5/i3, Pentium, and Celeron processors (up to 95W)
Efficient Memory Performance - Supports up to 16 GB DDR3 RAM (1066/1333/1600 MHz)

footer.about: Atlas motherboards are tuned for stable, quiet systems.
